originalText.text: I've been going to Dr. Buscemi for many years and she always meticulously takes care of my issues, listens to my concerns, and takes the time to explain everything and answer any questions I might have.  Highly recommend her.

text.text: I've been going to Dr. Buscemi for many years and she always meticulously takes care of my issues, listens to my concerns, and takes the time to explain everything and answer any questions I might have.  Highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr Buscemi and Dr Gruen along with their staff have always gone above and beyond for me. I’ve been with them since @2004 and recommend them to everyone. They always accommodate me for an appt and if I have to wait, it’s only because of another patient who has an emergency.  They competent, friendly, and remember my whole history.  They care.

originalText.text:
I strongly recommend everyone using a different doctor based on my experience in early 2016.

I came in for a routine skin check which was performed by Dr. Buscemi. The exam was executed in a sloppy manner and did not compare to any other exam I had at other doctor offices. Given the sloppiness of the exam, I feel the need to go to a different doctor to have the same exam performed which is unacceptable. I am not a doctor but I can tell that this exam did not slightly meet the lowest of expectations.

Additionally, the staff were extremely rude and disrespectful.

originalText.text: Would definitely NOT recommend this doctor. After Dr. Buscemi removed a cyst, my elbow swelled, and she could not correct it, and sent me to a plastic surgeon which was not his expertise. I went to my elbow orthopedic  surgeon who, under her care, her correcting the mistake Dr. Buscemi  created on my elbow of dis-figuration till today. Hopefully the elbow will return to its normal look? Anything complex is looking for trouble!!!  The doctor i went to felt that the doctor that did this should never have even started to remove such a sensitive area and not performed properly.

originalText.text: She did not wash her hands before performing an exam on me. Also not only was she unable to give me a diagnosis(she did not even try), she just did not seem to care about my condition. Needless to say, my issue remained unresolved until I saw someone with better skills who actually cared. She was overall underwhelming.
